DESCRIPTION: Dead On cards have a bonus effect when in the middle of your hand.
The next #yDead #yOn card played while #yConcentrated triggers its effect regardless of position. Wears off on turn end.
Bruised targets take more attack damage. Wears off on turn end.
Reduces next instance of attack damage taken to #b2 [REMOVE_SPACE].
Normal Enemy: #b15 gold.      Elite Enemy: #b40 gold.            Boss: #b100 gold.
